%mdk-data-line={224}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[15473f0ddf9b57f29c368d1dc24f2a5d]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={227}
\begin{aligned}
  K_i &\sim Normal(\mu_i, \sigma) \\
  \mu_i &= \alpha_{CLADE[i]} \\
  \alpha_i &\sim Normal(0, 0.5) \\
  \sigma &\sim Exponential(1)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={335}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[baeb59b81e1d5c4797ef21f0f3738eb7]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={342}
\begin{aligned} 
  y_i &\sim Normal(\mu_i, \sigma) \\
  \mu_i &= \alpha + \beta x_i  \\
  \alpha &\sim Normal(0, 20) \\
  \beta &\sim lognormal(0, 1) \\
  \sigma &\sim Exponential(1) \\
\end{aligned} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
